Title: Relates to COVID-19 testing for employees in nursing homes and residential health care facilities
Summary: Requires COVID-19 testing for employees in nursing homes and residential health care facilities at least once a week; provided, however, employees who have not received the full set of vaccinations shall be tested twice a week.
LawCode: Add ยง2805-aa, amd ยง4656, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring COVID-19 testing of certain employees at nursing homes, residential health care facilities, assisted living facilities and enhanced assisted living facilities; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
